mapper.select: select * from notice ORDER BY revise_date DESC, notice_no DESC LIMIT 10
select * from notice WHERE revise_date <= #{revise_date} AND notice_no < #{notice_no} ORDER BY revise_date DESC, notice_no DESC LIMIT 10
mapper.insert: insert into notice(admin_no, title, content, reg_date, revise_date, img) VALUES (#{admin_no}, #{title}, #{content}, #{reg_date}, #{revise_date}, #{img})
mapper.update: update notice SET admin_no=#{admin_no}, title=#{title}, content=#{content}, revise_date=#{revise_date}, img=#{img} WHERE notice_no=#{notice_no}
